metadata.title: CVE-2024-5258 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authorization vulnerability exists within GitLab from versions 16.10before 16.10.6, 16.11 before 16.11.3, and 17.0 before 17.0.1 where anauthenticated attacker could utilize a crafted naming convention to bypasspipeline authorization logic.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
